sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO EX_BOARD ( BOARD_UID , DATA_TITLE , DATA_CONTENT , REGISTER_ID , REGISTER_DT , UPDATE_ID , UPDATE_DT , BEGIN_DATE , END_DATE , DATA_SECRET , BOARD_TYPE , BOARD_DIVISION , DATA_DEP , BOARD_NUMBERFILE , CATEGORY1 , CATEGORY2 , CATEGORY3 , TMPFIELD1 , TMPFIELD2 , TMPFIELD3 , TMPFIELD4 , TMPFIELD5 , VIEW_COUNT ) VALUES ( #boardUid# , #dataTitle# , #dataContent# , #registerId# , #registerDt# , #updateId# , #updateDt# , #beginDate# , #endDate# , #dataSecret# , #boardType# , #boardDivision# , #dataDep# , #boardNumberfile# , #category1# , #category2# , #category3# , #tmpField1# , #tmpField2# , #tmpField3# , #tmpField4# , #tmpField5# , #viewCount# )
